import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; class App extends React.Component { state = { values: [] } rand = (min, max) => { return Math.random() * (max - min) + min; } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const minRef = parseInt(this.minRef.value); const maxRef = parseInt(this.maxRef.value); const rangeRef = parseInt(this.rangeRef.value); const decimalRef = parseInt(this.decimalRef.value); const result = [...Array(rangeRef)].map((_, i) => { return this.rand(minRef, maxRef).toFixed(decimalRef); }); this.setState({ values: result }); } render() { let values = this.state.values.map(value => ( {value} )) return (
this.minRef = input} className={"formControl"} placeholder={"Minimum value"} /> this.maxRef = input} className={"formControl"} placeholder={"Maximum value"} /> this.rangeRef = input} className={"formControl"} placeholder={"Range"} /> this.decimalRef = input} className={"formControl"} placeholder={"Decimal"} />
{ values }

); } } export default App;
